page.title: 18FOOTPATHS IN COOKSMILL GREEN
page.content: Some footpaths in this survey area are in danger of being lost.They are heav- ily{overgrown}or in{fields ploughed so {close}to the edge that no path is left Roxwell Parish Council received com- plaints about{the state of a byway}(an old path for wheeled vehicles).They asked for volunteers but none came for ward.Then the Council were asked to find work for a young offender who had been ordered to do 160 hrs{Community {Service.}Under the supervision of the then unemployed footpaths officer he {cleared}the byway.During the years of neglect,brambles had been shoved into the ditch and blocked them causing flooding problems.It was decided to clear a wider path than the orginal 6ft to help dry the path out,but more complaints were made because the path is now said to be too wide and nesting areas are disturbed.
